general_advidory: It is recommended to plant crops that are suitable for the current weather conditions. Make sure to monitor the weather regularly for any updates.

wheat.advisory: Plant wheat seeds at a depth of 1-2 inches with a spacing of 6 inches. Irrigate the crop regularly to ensure proper growth.

rice.advisory: Transplant rice seedlings at a spacing of 15x15 cm. Keep the field flooded with water during the early stages of growth.

maize.advisory: Sow maize seeds in well-drained soil with a spacing of 12 inches between plants. Apply nitrogen-based fertilizers for better yield.

cotton.advisory: Plant cotton seeds in sandy loam soil with proper drainage. Monitor for pests and use pesticides when necessary.

soybean.advisory: Sow soybean seeds at a depth of 1-2 inches with row spacing of 30 inches. Use balanced fertilizers for healthy growth.
